nhc_headline: ...ALBERTO MOVING INLAND OVER MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS AND FLASH FLOODING CONTINUE IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO...
summary:
...ALBERTO MOVING INLAND OVER MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS AND FLASH FLOODING CONTINUE IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Thu Jun 20
 the center of Alberto was located near 22.3, -98.3
 with movement W at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 997 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
